programme.title: Poker Night In America

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.sub-title: The Best of Set No Good I

programme.desc: Our favorite hands and moments featuring the Poker Brat, Phill Hellmuth. Featuring Phil Hellmuth, Brad Garrett, Matt Glantz, Liv Boeree, Rep Porter, Jennifer Tilly, Greg Mueller, Dan Shak.

programme.desc: A compilation of our favorite ill-timed and horribly wrong bluff attempts. Featuring Alec Torelli, Blake Bohn, Brandon Cantu, Joe McKeehan, Phil Laak, Esther Taylor, Jeremy Kaufman, Doug Polk.

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: Poker Night is back in action at Studio 52 in Las Vegas! Featuring Jason Somerville, MJ Gonzales, Lily Kiletto, Dan Shak, Johnnie Vibes, and Jesse Sylvia.

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: The party continues at Studio 52 as we see one of the rarest hands in all of poker. Featuring commentary from Lon McEachern and Phil Galfond. Tonight's lineup: Maria Konnikova, MJ Gonzales, Johnnie Vibes, Darren Rabinowitz, Jesse Sylvia & Cedrric Trevino.

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: Phil Galfond makes his Poker Night in America debut playing $25/$50/$100. Lineup: MJ Gonzales, Adam Hendrix, Phil Galfond, Bob Mather, Nick Vertucci, Jeremiah Williams. Commentary by Phil Galfond & Lon McEachern.

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: It's LADIES NIGHT at Studio 52 and we're playing $25/$50+. This is one of the most unpredictable tables we've ever had. Featuring Lily Kiletto, Farah Galfond, Hayley Hanna, Christina 'BabyShark' Gollins, Aiza Sison & Lynn Banks! Commentary by Phil Galfond & Lon McEachern.

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: MJ Gonzales reads through the soul of a 3-barrel bluff. What else would you expect from Daniel Negreanu's poker coach? Episode 5 features special guest Cody Daniels making his poker night debut. Full Line up: Cody Daniels, MJ Gonzales, Johnnie Vibes, DJ Washburn, Adam Hendrix, Nicky Ringz & Danny Panagatos.

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: More $25/$50+ high stakes action from Studio 52 in Las Vegas. Lineup features MJ Gonzales, Adam Hendrix, Christian Soto, Jared Jaffee, Danny Panagatos & Mitchell Bank.

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: Tensions rise on the felt as the poker action heats up in this wild $25/$50/$100 high stakes cash game from Studio 52 in Las Vegas. Lineup features Krissy Foxen, Christian Soto, Jared Jaffee, MJ Gonzales, Hayley Hanna & Christina McAlpin.

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: The established PROS received BAD intel on Keir Sullivan, not realizing they invited a SHARK to their game. Wild high stakes action $100/$200. Lineup: Shaun Deeb, Ben Lamb, Keir Sullivan, MJ Gonzales, Shane Sigsbee, Craig Stackewicz, Clay Johnson. Commentary by Joe Stapleton.

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: If anyone can stop Keir Sullivan's winning streak, it's Shaun Deeb...right? Wild high stakes action $100/$200. Lineup: Shaun Deeb, Ben Lamb, Keir Sullivan, MJ Gonzales, Shane Sigsbee, Craig Stackewicz, Clay Johnson. Commentary by Joe Stapleton.

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: More high stakes $100/$200/$400+ featuring Shaun Deeb and friends with commentary from comedian Joe Stapleton - Season 10 Episode 10 filmed in Las Vegas, NV (November 2023). Lineup: Shaun Deeb, Ben Lamb, Keir Sullivan, MJ Gonzales, Shane Sigsbee, Craig Stackewicz, Clay Johnson. Commentary by Joe Stapleton.

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: Table Finale of the $100/$200/$400 high stakes poker cash game featuring Shaun Deeb and friends with commentary from comedian Joe Stapleton - Season 10 Episode 11 filmed in Las Vegas, NV (November 2023). Lineup: Shaun Deeb, Ben Lamb, Keir Sullivan, MJ Gonzales, Shane Sigsbee, Craig Stackewicz, Clay Johnson. Commentary by Joe Stapleton.

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: Can 9-time NHL All-Star Jeremy Roenick use his aggressive and competitive spirit to outwit a table full of poker sharks or will he be a fish out of water? Watch Jeremy at the Poker Night in America Studio 52 cash game with Jason Somerville, Scott Ball, Jeremiah Williams, Terrance Reid, Jesse Sylvia and Nick Marchington.

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: Jeremy Roenick fights to survive against bad luck and nasty run outs ($25/$50/$100). Lineup: Jeremy Roenick, Jason Somerville, Scott Ball, TJ Reid, Jesse Sylvia, Nick Marchington, Jeremiah Williams. Commentary by Joe Stapleton.

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: More from Studio 52 with Jeremy Roenick. ($25/$50/$100). Lineup: Jeremy Roenick, Jason Somerville, Scott Ball, TJ Reid, Jesse Sylvia, Nick Marchington, Jeremiah Williams. Commentary by Joe Stapleton.
